name: PUBLIC ACCESS TO SUNSCREENS (PASS) COALITION
description: Informal coalition of health and consumer organizations and sunscreen industry companies
sampleDescriptions: Over the counter drug approval process for sunscreen ingredients; Implementation of Public Law 113-195, the Sunscreen Innovation Act; House and Senate FY 2019 Ag-FDA Appropriations bill; nominations to HHS and FDA; H.Res.282 on sunscreen use in schools; Sunscreen provisions in H.R. 5333, the Over-the-Counter Monograph Safety, Innovation and Reform Act of 2018, and S.2315, the Over-the-Counter Drug Safety, Innovation, and Reform Act.

Over the counter drug approval process for sunscreen ingredients; Implementation of Public Law 113-195, the Sunscreen Innovation Act; House and Senate FY 2019 Ag-FDA Appropriations bill (H.R. 5961, S.2976); H.Res.282 on sunscreen use in schools; Sunscreen provisions in H.R. 5333, the Over-the-Counter Monograph Safety, Innovation and Reform Act of 2018, and S.2315, the Over-the-Counter Drug Safety, Innovation, and Reform Act; issues related to state bans on sunscreen ingredients.

Over the counter drug approval process for sunscreen ingredients; Implementation of Public Law 113-195, the Sunscreen Innovation Act; House and Senate FY 2019 Ag-FDA Appropriations bills and reports (H.R. 5961, S.2976); H.Res.282 on sunscreen use in schools; Sunscreen provisions in H.R. 5333, the Over-the-Counter Monograph Safety, Innovation and Reform Act of 2018, and S.2315, the Over-the-Counter Drug Safety, Innovation, and Reform Act; issues related to state bans on sunscreen ingredients.

Over the counter drug approval process for sunscreen ingredients; Implementation of Public Law 113-195, the Sunscreen Innovation Act; House and Senate FY 2020 Ag-FDA Appropriations bills and reports on sunscreen use in schools; Sunscreen provisions in H.R. 269, the Pandemic and All-Hazards Preparedness and Advancing Innovation Act of 2019; issues related to state bans on sunscreen ingredients.

Over the counter drug approval process for sunscreen ingredients; Implementation of Public Law 113-195, the Sunscreen Innovation Act; House and Senate FY 2020 Ag-FDA Appropriations bills and reports (H.R. 3164); Sunscreen use in schools; Sunscreen provisions in H.R. 3443, Over-the-Counter Monograph Safety, Innovation and Reform Act of 2019; Issues related to state bans on sunscreen ingredients.

Over the counter drug approval process for sunscreen ingredients; Implementation of Public Law 113-195, the Sunscreen Innovation Act; House and Senate FY 2020 Ag-FDA Appropriations bills and reports (H.R. 3164 & S.2522); Sunscreen use in schools; Sunscreen provisions in H.R. 3443, Over-the-Counter Monograph Safety, Innovation and Reform Act of 2019; Issues related to state bans on sunscreen ingredients.

Over the counter drug approval process for sunscreen ingredients; Implementation of Public Law 113-195, the Sunscreen Innovation Act; House and Senate FY 2020 Ag-FDA Appropriations bills and reports (H.R. 3164 & S.2522); Sunscreen use in schools; Sunscreen provisions in H.R. 3443 and S.2740, Over-the-Counter Monograph Safety, Innovation and Reform Act of 2019; Issues related to state bans on sunscreen ingredients.

Over the counter drug approval process for sunscreen ingredients; Implementation of Public Law 113-195, the Sunscreen Innovation Act; House and Senate FY 2021 Ag-FDA Appropriations bills and reports; Sunscreen use in schools; Sunscreen provisions in H.R. 3443 and S.2740, Over-the-Counter Monograph Safety, Innovation and Reform Act of 2019; Issues related to state bans on sunscreen ingredients; Issues related to sunscreen use and coral reefs.

Implementation of the over the counter drug approval process reforms for sunscreen ingredients included in the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (CARES Act; Public Law 116-136); Implementation of Public Law 113-195, the Sunscreen Innovation Act; House and Senate FY 2021 Ag-FDA Appropriations bills and reports (H.R. 7610); House and Senate FY 2021 Commerce, Justice Science appropriations; issues related to state bans on sunscreen ingredients; issues related to sunscreen use and coral reefs.
